column4: A gag will control your mouth, while I control your mind.
The tighter the better!  This also applies to gags.
A silenced magician cannot do any harm.
Stop your futile mumblings.
(She catches her breath, barely struggles and seems very proud of you.)
(She releases and you dress back up.)  Sorry, you failed the test, you're not ready to learn yet.
(A prestigious magus from House Maiestas salutes you.)  Your reputation heralds you, great wizard DialogPlayerName.
(A high sorcerer from House Vincula rushes to you.)  I've heard about you!  You're the powerful magician DialogPlayerName.
(You meet one of the oracles from House Amplector.)  Sweetheart, you're more than a sage now, you're a legend.  (She gives you a hug.)
(A powerful warlock from House Corporis does a secret handshake with you.)  It's an honor to meet you, witch DialogPlayerName.
(You exchange a few words on the magic school and she changes subject.)  Have you heard of House Maiestas secret technique?

column3: Hey!  Great to see you sorcerer!
column4: (You do a high five and chat a little, the subject changes quickly.)  You might be ready to learn Vincula's forbidden spell.

column3: (Give the oracle a long warm hug.)
column4: (You share a warm and loving hug.)  The oracles have been talking.  Would you like to learn House Amplector ritual?

column3: The honor is mine, mighty warlock.
column4: (You talk about houses wars and she changes subject.)  The warlock inner circle is ready to teach you a dark spell, are you ready for it?

column3: Tell me of that secret technique.
column4: House Maiestas master's control and self-control.  We have developed a technique to cast much easier while being restrained.
We created a forbidden spell: the Stricta Lorum.  This magic will create, strap and tighten a magic armbinder on your opponent.

column3: I would love to learn more on that ritual.
column4: The oracles perfected the ritual of the flesh.  We repeat it everyday so being stripped doesn't affect our spellcasting ability.
The dark spell name is: Nuda Caro.  It fully strips your opponent in one incantation, leaving only naked flesh to burn.
(She nods.)  You could, but you must face me in battle first.  I must make sure you're ready.
(You release her as she nods slowly.)  Wizard, you're ready to learn House Maestas secret self-control technique.
(You release her as she gives you a high five.)  I'll teach you House Vincula forbidden armbinder spell: the Stricta Lorum.
(You release her and exchange a long hug.)  You're a true sage, I will teach you House Amplector ritual of the flesh.
(She jumps from the pain as you release her.)  Witch, you're ready for House Corporis dark spell: Nuda Caro.
(After hours and hours of bondage training, you feel that restraints won't hamper your spells too much.)  Congratulations, you did it.
(After hours and hours of spell casting, you master the Stricta Lorum spell.)  Magician!  You're ready for bondage magic battles.
(After hours and hours of nude training, you feel that being stripped won't affect your spells at all.)  Sweetie, you're the best.
(After hours and hours of spell casting, you master the Nuda Caro spell.)  Strike first and your opponents won't stand a chance.
It's been my pleasure.  Stay with us if you don't want to lose that knowledge.

column3: I will do better next time.
column4: (She nods.)  I'm sure you will.
(She shakes her head from left to right.)
